name: Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Official Game Soundtrack

Once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game's root installation directory. "Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet - Official Game Soundtrack" features 23 tracks with about 26 minutes of original music! - by Nikolas Sideris.

To access the Soundtrack from Steam: select 'Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet' -> right click -> 'View Downloadable content' -> 'Local Files' -> 'Browse local files' -> 'Nelly Cootalot The Fowl Fleet - Original Soundtrack'

Track listing

1. Bloodbeard Appears.mp3
2. Working In The Mailroom.mp3
3. Cinematic #1 - The Heartless.mp3
4. Rubicund Quay.mp3
5. Cinematic #2 - The Race.mp3
6. In The Races.mp3
7. Vogel Island Beach.mp3
8. Cinematic #3 - The Fleet.mp3
9. The Santiana.mp3
10. Groat Harbor.mp3
11. Van Zandt's Office.mp3
12. Boardwalk And More.mp3
13. Chinatown.mp3
14. Court Room.mp3
15. Too Nice To Leave Out.mp3
16. A Full Bird Battle.mp3
17. Cinematic #4 - Approaching Gloomholm.mp3
18. Walk of Shame #1 - Evil.mp3
19. Walk of Shame #2 - Not Evil.mp3
20. Volcano Crater #1 - Normal.mp3
21. Volcano Crater #2 - Tension.mp3
22. Cinematic #5 - The Battle.mp3
23. Final Credits.mp3
